page.title: 20MY FAMILY
page.content: I am Geoffrey Snell,Iam 11 years old and I live at 82,Redworth Road, Shildon.Ihave a brother called Nathaniel and a sister called Miriam who isthe eldest.We have 3 computers,one is a television game.My Dad is a Headteacher of a Primary school in Bishop Auckland and he sometimes brings the school BBC computer home.We can type in our own programs or copy them from the tv.Sometimes he brings the video recorder so that we can watch videos.I collect soldiers,stamps and cars. My Dad has over 12500 different stamps and he has a good collection of old coins,the oldest is dated 1677. My Mum is a Lunchtime Supervisory Assistent at All Saints'School where I attend.My sister attends Sunnydale Comprehensive School.On Fridays my Mother does her milk round.
